# ActivityCategoryToken

**Type Alias**

A token that represents a category of app or website activity.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias ActivityCategoryToken = Token<ActivityCategory>
```

## Discussion

Use `ActivityCategoryToken` to restrict and filter device applications without access to personal user data. [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/FamilyControls/FamilyActivitySelection] provides tokens that devices within the same Family Sharing group can use to identify applications.

## Categories

- **ActivityCategory**: An activity’s category, such as Entertainment or Social.
